items.title: Welcome to HalfBlog
items.summary: Hello, this is my new blog, for real this time, I won’t be using ATSPACE with WordPress since it needs SSL, which you have to…
items.content_html:
Hello, this is my new blog, for real this time, I won’t be using ATSPACE with WordPress since it needs SSL, which you have to pay for :(

So I decided to post the blog posts here, hosted under GitHub Pages!

End.
